epiRomics 0.1.3
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Getting Started with EpiRomics

    Reference

    All functions

    epiRomicsS4-class

    An S4 class to manage epiRomics databases and downstream results

    epiRomics_build_dB()

    Build epiRomics database

    epiRomics_build_dB_2()

    Build epiRomics database

    epiRomics_chromatin_tracks()

    Visualizes chromatin availability

    epiRomics_enhanceosome()

    Identifies putative enhanceosome regions by cross-referencing candidate enhancer regions against co-TF enrichment

    epiRomics_enhancer_predictor_test()

    Interrogates various histone marks against a curated database to determine which are most informative

    epiRomics_enhancers()

    Identifies putative enhancer regions utilizing select histone marks

    epiRomics_enhancers_filter()

    Filters putative enhancers called by epiRomics_enhancers by crossing against curated FANTOM data

    epiRomics_predictors()

    Predicts TF behavior in association with enhanceosome presence in accordance with functional annotation

    epiRomics_region_tracks()

    Visualizes chromatin availability at custom regions

    epiRomics_regions_of_interest()

    Evaluates whether regions of interest derived from external experiments, such as ATAC-Seq, correspond with enhanceosome regions

    epiRomics_track_layer()

    Visualizes data from epiRomics results

    epiRomics_track_layer_human()

    Visualizes data from epiRomics results
